text: Zaporizhia march (Cossack march) is a piece of music by Yevhen Adamtsevich, a blind bandurist. Famous for arrangement and orchestration by Viktor Hutsal. == Authorship == It is widely accepted that the author of the famous «Zaporizhian March» alone is the Romny kobzar Yevhen Adamtsevych, a student of Musiy Oleksiyenko. In particular, it is confirmed via the correspondence of the researcher of kobzar performance O. Pravdyuk with the bandurist. In one letter to him Yevhen Adamtsevych wrote: Category:Ukrainian songs Category:1969 songs
title: Zaporozhian march
